About us - Champions Club Special Needs Ministry info@championsclub.org Facebook X Instagram Facebook X Instagram 0 Items Donate Curriculum Champions Club Curriculum NEW! Champions Club Curriculum for Teens & Adults Plan de Estudios Other Languages Locations Get Started Shop Cart Checkout About Select Page Hello! Do you want to get to know us better? Champions Club is a special needs ministry, specialized in ministering to, and designing developmental areas for kids, teens, and adults with special needs and the medically fragile. We have created a program that meets the developmental needs of individuals with special needs in four important ways: SPIRITUALLY, EMOTIONALLY, PHYSICALLY, and CREATIVELY . Core Value #1 We never, ever, turn away an individual. No matter how severe the situation may be. Core Value #2 Every person walking in to a Champions Club will feel loved and accepted. Core Value #3 We offer a holistic approach of care that develops the mind, body, soul and spirit. Core Value #4 We give tangible hope to every family with special needs and the medically fragile. Core Value #5 We create inclusive environments for those with special needs and secure opportunities for them to learn alongside their peers in typical environments. Core Value #6 We develop the gifts and talents of those with special needs so they can become everything God has created them to be. Even more about us ! Pastor Craig Johnson founded Champions Club in 2009. Find out more about our history and the heart behind our organization. Craig Johnson Founder of Champions Club Craig is a pastor, author, and advocate for those with special needs. He is currently serving as the Associate Pastor at Lakewood Church with Joel Osteen. Craig is not only the founder of Champions Club Developmental Centers and Champions Foundation, he is also the co-author of “Champions Curriculum”, a full scope Christian curriculum for individuals with special needs, as well as the books “Lead Vertically: Inspire People to Volunteer and Build Great Teams That Last”, and “Champion: How one boy’s journey through Autism is changing the world”. Craig & his wife Samantha co-wrote the inclusive children’s book “You Are Extraordinary”. Craig and his wife of over 30 years, Samantha, have three children: Cory, Courtney, and Connor. “We point those with extraordinary needs to their destiny and help them navigate how to get there.” Craig’s passion to advocate for families with special needs comes from his own family. Until two years of age, Craig and Samantha’s son Connor was just like other kids—playful, verbal, and affectionate. Then everything changed. He stopped talking, displayed behavioral problems, and withdrew into his own world. The official diagnosis: autism. Faced with seemingly insurmountable odds, Craig and Samantha refused to believe a meaningful life for Connor was impossible. God confirmed their faith by revealing to Craig that Connor would one day touch the lives of thousands of people around the world. Craig and Samantha held that unlikely promise in their hearts during the agonizing years ahead. Through the family’s unexpected journey, God has used Connor’s life that has launched a global ministry for special needs. Champions Club has been a blessing to my son’s life. At one point, my son’s school saw him as a troubled child. Champions Club saw him as a gifted child . Their guidance proved valuable to Zachary, his school and myself. Champions Club was the only one that said, “Yes, we can help your son.” Gail Medina Zachery's mom The Champions Club Curriculum is the root of our success as a ministry. Several other organizations have reached out to us to ask where we got such an amazing curriculum for our students with special needs. Pastor Paul Cope Director , Calvary Church Locations Worlwide Lives Impacted Countries Frequently Asked Questions: What is a Champions Club? Champions Club is a special needs ministry, specialized in ministering to and designing developmental areas for kids, teens, and adults with special needs and the medically fragile. We have developed a program that meets the developmental needs of individuals with special needs in four important ways: SPIRITUALLY , EMOTIONALLY , PHYSICALLY, and CREATIVELY . How can I open a Champions Club in my organization? Visit the Get Started page to learn about ways to receive training and fill out the Champions Club Interest Form to connect with someone from our team. I am a parent of a child with special needs. What kind of support can you offer me? Champions Club believes in a holistic care approach and serves the entire family. We offer respite nights, family friendly events, and resource fairs. We’ve also created an amazing online community for families to receive the daily hope and encouragement you need to thrive as family. How do I sponsor a Champion or sponsor a Champions Club? To sponsor a champion, or to sponsor a Champions Club, visit our donate page . Subscribe to our mailing list About Us Champions Club is a special needs ministry serving kids, teens and adults with special needs and the medically fragile. We welcome ALL individuals with autism, down syndrome, cerebral palsy, and other diagnoses and medical conditions. Support our Mission Champions Club Curriculum Locations Give Start a Champions Club Shop Facebook X Instagram Copyright © Champions Foundation, All Rights Reserved.

Contact Us - The Champions Club at Summerfield Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer The Champions Club at Summerfield Stuart, FL Phone: (772) 283-1500 Book Tee Times Book Member Tee Times Join E-Club Home Book Online Golf About Us Rates Scorecard & Course Layout Photo Gallery Leagues Lessons Golf Academy First Tee – Treasure Coast Events Book A Golf Event Events Calendar Past Events Bar & Grill Memberships Memberships Summer Membership Member Tee Times E-Club Text Club Send a Gift Contact Us Contact Us Career Opportunities Directions Contact Us The Best Experience Possible The Champion’s Club’s mission is to provide its guests with a premier daily fee facility. We strive to provide consistent quality playing conditions, and wonderful customer service from our staff. We strive to exceed our clients expectations while providing a warm and inviting environment. Thank you; enjoy our golf course, grill and practice range and green, and when you’re ready to improve your game further – give David Ladd a call with the DLadd Golf Academy. Please feel free to let us know how we are doing and make it a great day! The Champions Golf Club 1-772-283-1500 David Ladd, PGA GM/Director of Golf david@davidladd.com Information Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. It measures 6,890 yards from the gold tees if you want a true challenge. The blue tees play at 6313 yards, white at 5771, and green at 4977. Facilities: You will see our driving range as you enter the property. Next to it we have just completed a brand new, half acre chipping area complete with a bunker and three pin locations. Our putting green is behind the clubhouse. Primary Sidebar Course News New driving range balls and targets! Directions - The Champions Club at Summerfield Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer The Champions Club at Summerfield Stuart, FL Phone: (772) 283-1500 Book Tee Times Book Member Tee Times Join E-Club Home Book Online Golf About Us Rates Scorecard & Course Layout Photo Gallery Leagues Lessons Golf Academy First Tee – Treasure Coast Events Book A Golf Event Events Calendar Past Events Bar & Grill Memberships Memberships Summer Membership Member Tee Times E-Club Text Club Send a Gift Contact Us Contact Us Career Opportunities Directions Directions From I-95 (North or South of Stuart) Leave I-95 at Exit 101, Kanner Highway, (Route 76). Go 1/2-mile towards Stuart and turn right onto Cove Road. Go east on Cove Road for just over 5 miles, and turn right onto US Highway #1. Go South on US #1 for 1/2 mile. Turn right at Champions Club Summerfield – Summerfield Way into the entrance. From Florida’s Turnpike Leave Turnpike at Exit 133, Martin Highway (Route. 714). Go east on Martin Highway and cross the bridge over South Fork of St. Lucie River. Then, go straight on Monterey Road for almost a mile and a half to US Highway 1. Turn right onto US 1 and go south for 2 miles and turn left into Champions Club of Summerfield entrance. Sorry - your browser does not support iframes. Club Champion is the world’s top club fitter, with more than 140 locations. Each custom club studio offers industry-leading Master Fitters who fit and handcraft every club to your unique needs. Make breaking 100, 90, or 80 a reality with our unrivaled, comprehensive custom club fittings. We’re happy to fit your existing set or fit you for new clubs. 21 + YARDS OFF THE TEE 12 + YARDS BETTER DISPERSION 5 + MPH IN BALL SPEED 3 + STROKES SAVED PER ROUND CUSTOM CLUB FITTING OPTIONS * $100 FULL BAG FITTINGS + $50 ALL OTHER FITTINGS WITH CUSTOM CLUB PURCHASE — VIEW DETAILS FULL BAG FITTING $100* $400 3 HOURS VIEW DETAILS FULL BAG MINUS PUTTER $100* $325 2.5 HOURS VIEW DETAILS LONG GAME $50* $250 2 HOURS VIEW DETAILS DRIVER $50* $175 1.5 HOURS VIEW DETAILS IRON + WEDGE $50* $175 1.5 HOURS VIEW DETAILS FAIRWAY WOOD/HYBRID $50* $125 1 HOUR VIEW DETAILS PUTTER $50* $125 1 HOUR VIEW DETAILS WEDGE $50* $100 1 HOUR VIEW DETAILS Dial in your game with 65,000+ head, shaft, and grip combinations — featuring top brands like Callaway, Titleist, and TaylorMade. Fujikura Cobra Odyssey 2Thumb UST Mamiya P2 PRGR Lamkin Edel LA Golf SwitchGrips Vice Golf Garsen No1 Accra Miura Newton Golf Shafts PXG JP Golf Traxion ProjectX More Golf Arccos Epon Cleveland Flat Golf Bettinardi TaylorMade Srixon Callaway Mitsubishi Mizuno Golf Pride Aerotech Wilson Staff Vice Golf Veylix GripMaster Scotty Cameron Sacks Parente True Temper OBAN SuperStroke Best Grips Titleist SeeMore BGT KBS XXIO TourEdge Bloodline Ben Hogan Kinetixx Aldila Iomic Axis1 Graphite Design Evnroll LAB Golf VA composites Bridgestone Winn Toulon Nippon PING Homna EXPLORE PRODUCTS + SERVICES FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS WHO SHOULD GET A CUSTOM CLUB FITTING? Whether you are a high handicapper, a PGA pro, a beginner, a youth golfer, or any other segment of the sport, a custom club fitting is right for you. Anyone looking to find more distance, more consistency, better golf performance overall, or anyone looking to overcome issues like slices, low/high spin, or others should consider a comprehensive custom club fitting. Club Champion is brand agnostic and dedicated to finding the best possible club combination for every level of golfer. Our Master Fitters are trained to improve the golf game of any golfer through better equipment found with real-time data and industry-leading technology . More distance, improved accuracy, fewer putts, more confidence with your clubs — we work with you to find a solution for all your golf goals. WHEN SHOULD YOU GET FIT? Golfers should be fit for clubs when some or all of their equipment no longer suits their game. When a golfer feels their equipment is working against their natural swing motion or isn't providing the intended performance, it's time for a fitting check-up. Golfers may not need a brand new club or bag overhaul every time they visit — Club Champion can fit and optimize existing equipment as well as provide recommendations for new options based on data. HOW OFTEN SHOULD YOU GET FIT? The "latest" equipment isn't always the best equipment for your unique swing. On average, golfers will be fitted for a full bag every 2-3 years. Some clubs, like wedges, should be updated more frequently based on factors like how often you play, playing conditions, etc. Grips should be replaced every season at minimum and simple adjustments like loft and lie should be considered annually to keep your fitted clubs performing optimally. That said, there are plenty of golfers who want to explore new releases every year — there is no limit to how frequently you can check in on your game. THE PROOF IS IN THE IMPROVEMENT 4.5/5 average over 5,000 Google reviews MORE FROM CLUB CHAMPION READ MORE ARTICLES CLUB CHAMPION DIFFERENCE: A.I. FITTER CO-PILOT Club Champion's proprietary A.I. Fitter Co-Pilot system allows for faster, more accurate club fittings and even better data. CLUB CHAMPION DIFFERENCE: MASTER BUILDERS Only Club Champion employs Master Builders and craftsmen to hand-build each and every custom golf club. CLUB CHAMPION DIFFERENCE: AFTERMARKET SHAFTS A true custom club fitting is all about performance, and Club Champion puts an emphasis on the RIGHT shaft for your golf game. READY FOR A FITTING? WE’RE ON YOUR TURF. BOOK NOW READY FOR A FITTING? WE’RE ON YOUR TURF. PROGRAM (PERKS AND REWARDS PROGRAM) TERMS AND CONDITIONS Club Champion may, at any time, terminate, alter or modify the P.A.R. program and/or these Terms and Conditions without any further obligations and/or benefits to members without notice even though such changes may affect the value of benefits or rewards for redemption. Club Champion reserves the right to apply changes retroactively to benefits already accrued under the program. These terms and conditions are void where prohibited by law. BENEFIT TERMS: 1 free fitting, excluding full bag. Use your P.A.R. Membership # to book your free fitting, excluding full bag fittings, online or by calling Club Champion. This fitting must be booked and completed within your membership period. This benefit does not roll over in the event of a requalification. Fitting must be completed in one appointment. Not applicable to previous fittings or bookings. Appointments are limited. 3 free 1-hour TrackMan practice sessions. 1-hour TrackMan practice sessions must be booked through your fitter or through Club Champion’s Customer Experience team; please relay your P.A.R. Membership #. TrackMan sessions may be subject to blackout times. TrackMan sessions cannot be booked more than 14 days out. TrackMan sessions cannot be canceled or rescheduled; a request for cancelation or rescheduling will result in a forfeiture of the asset. Sessions must be booked in one-hour (60-minute) increments and cannot be split. This benefit does not roll over in the event of a requalification. Sessions are subject to bay and fitter availability. Appointments are limited. $5 discount per golf ball dozen. Receive a $5 discount on golf ball brands carried in-store. Not applicable to golf balls that are already discounted. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Purchase must be made in-store. Subject to ball inventory. Not applicable on previous purchases. Free new grip installation. Receive a waived installation fee ($6 savings per grip) per new grip. Only applicable on grips purchased through Club Champion. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Purchase must be made in-store. Grip selection subject to inventory. Not applicable on previous purchases. 50% off SST PUREing and retro-PUREing. Receive 50% off shaft SST PUREing or retro-PUREing. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Purchase must be made in-store. PUREing or retro-PUREing may require that clubs be sent to a Club Champion warehouse; the process, including shipping, may take up to 10 business days and is subject to third-party shipping timelines. Not applicable on previous purchases. Club customization. Receive customization (stamping, paint fill, custom ferrules) up to a $50 value. The $50 value must be used on a single transaction; if the entire value is not used, the remainder will be forfeited. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Customization must be done by Club Champion builders; refinishing and other third-party customizations are excluded. Customization may require that clubs be sent to a Club Champion warehouse; the process, including shipping, is subject to builder availability and third-party shipping timelines. This benefit does not roll over in the event of a requalification. Subject to availability. Not applicable on previous purchases. Exclusive offers and giveaways. Subject to the offer or giveaway terms. MEMBERSHIP/ELIGIBILITY Club Champion P.A.R. program is open to all persons who are at least 13 years of age, residents of the United States (including United States territories) or Canada; and have provided a valid email address at the time of their fitting and qualifying purchase. Club Champion customers are automatically enrolled in the program by completing a qualifying purchase of $1,500 or more. By participating in the P.A.R. program, you represent that you agree to these terms and conditions. Customers may opt out of the program by notifying Club Champion (see details below). Your membership is non-transferable and is subject to these terms and conditions, as they may be amended from time to time. Enrollment begins upon the completion of your first qualifying purchase. After your qualifying purchase, you will receive an email with your membership account number. You are solely responsible for protecting your membership number and not sharing your membership number with anyone else. HOW TO QUALIFY Every Club Champion customer who purchases $1,500 or more within the calendar year qualifies for the program. Re-qualification takes place with every $1,500 in qualifying purchases. Upon requalification, TrackMan and fitting benefits reset (do not stack. Calculations are based upon pre-tax dollars spent at checkout. Dollars cannot be earned on purchases made prior to October 1, 2023. Non-qualifying purchases include returned merchandise, refunds, and gift cards. Only one membership account number may be used in connection with a purchase. Dollars will only post to one Club Champion P.A.R. program account per person. GENERAL TERMS Membership account number has no cash value and is non-transferable. Club Champion is not responsible for communication errors, including distribution of and notification of dollars spent due to a change of email address or email deliverability. Unused benefits do not roll over in the event of requalification. Other restrictions or exclusions may apply. MEMBERSHIP CANCELLATION, MODIFICATION, EXPIRATION AND TERMINATION You may cancel your membership at any time by contacting Club Champion’s Customer Service by mail, email or telephone. Club Champion will in its sole discretion, terminate your account on or after the last day of the of your membership period if you have not completed additional qualifying purchases to extend. In all matters relating to the administration of the Club Champion P.A.R. program, the decisions of Club Champion shall be final. Club Champion reserves the right to cancel, amend or revoke any program, including, without limitation, the P.A.R. program, at any time due to reasonable business consideration or circumstances beyond its control or as required by applicable law. In addition, Club Champion reserves the right to terminate your P.A.R. membership and void any balance accumulated in such account(s), if you, in Club Champion’s sole discretion, violate any of these terms and conditions or any applicable law, via deception, forgery, fraud, or commit any other abuse of the P.A.R. program. HOW TO CONTACT THE CLUB CHAMPION P.A.R. PROGRAM Official terms for this program can be found at: ClubChampion.com/rewards. For information about your account or to update your account information, or to schedule reward services contact Club Champion’s Customer Service. Please have your membership number with you when contacting Customer Service. Customer service hours are 8 am - 6 pm Central Standard Time, Monday – Friday. You can contact us by mail at: Club Champion, 7501 S. Quincy Street, suite 130, Willowbrook, IL 60527 or by email: This email address is being protected from spambots. Appointments are limited. × × "I did a full bag fitting with Adam over the winter, and WOW was I blown away! I'll share a bit of my experience here: I originally went to Club Champion because they have access to more exotic shaft options on hand, in particular for my driver. After doing my research, I narrowed down what I wanted to two different shafts. At my fitting, I was able to swing both of those, and they just weren't getting the results I wanted. Adam had me try a couple other options that I hadn't considered, and I was astounded by the results. Within 20 minutes, Adam had me dialed in to a new shaft that increased my ball speed, reduced spin, and increased the total distance of my driver by 23 yards . INCREDIBLE! After getting fit for the driver, we went through the rest of the bag; hybrid, irons, wedges, and putter. Adam had a no-pressure sales style, even at one time saying that I'd be a fool to replace the wedges I'm currently hitting, since the data showed he couldn't fit me into anything better. He didn't have any bias towards certain brands. He just wanted whatever works best for my swing. I appreciate that he's all about data and results, and not just trying to sell me as much as possible. Fast forward to this summer: I've had by far the best season of golf of my life, mostly because of my increased accuracy and length off the tee with my new driver and hybrid. Par 5s have started to surrender eagles and birdies more frequently, and I have much shorter approaches coming into the greens than I ever have. I was already a golf junkie beforehand, but my enjoyment for the game has been elevated to a whole new level this year. If you're serious about improving your game, don't spare the expense. There is so much more that goes into selecting a club than just picking a regular/stiff flex shaft. Unlike some of the other places you can go, these guys know what they're doing and are going to get you exactly what you need." — Jonny J. | Edina, MN × × "Really pleased with my Club Champion fitting. Wasn't quite sure what to expect, my prior fittings (if you want to call it that) in a golf shop bay were based on a handful of demo clubs they had available to test. Stock items only, no selection or ability to try different shafts, etc. Now Club Champion is a whole different story. Racks and racks of shafts and clubheads...which actually was a bit daunting at first. Then met with Rich, a Master Fitter & Club Builder. He put me through the paces with my own clubs to establish a baseline and actually "watch" my swing. Then the tweaking began with different clubheads from different manufacturers and shaft combinations, with him picking up the nuances of my swing and finding the best combos. He could tell when I had a great shot as soon the ball left the clubhead, while we waited for the TrackMan to catch up and confirm just how great it was. I was impressed. I'm 69 years old, my mobility is not what it used to be, and I've been losing distance at a frustrating rate. BUT, I have to tell you after we were done, I was hitting the irons 20-30 yards further (with a slight draw, no less) than when I walked in the door. Amazing! Then on to the driver. We tried a few combos and came to the conclusion that I was hitting my existing driver pretty good as is. That in itself sold me on Rich as a club fitter and Club Champion as a company. Rich took the time, answered all my questions and had answers that I didn't even know the questions to ask. No pressure." — BG | Del Mar, CA × × "This was the first time I'd had a club fitting. I've not had the opportunity to play that often, but retirement is just around the corner and I want to get back into the swing of golf. Taylor was the best! He was extremely knowledgeable about the right club type, weight, and length to match my swing . I saw firsthand through the advanced technology the difference a club change made. Taylor helped me with a full bag fitting. He did not try to push me into a club I did not need but truly focused on an actual reduction in club count. Can't wait to use my new clubs in the weeks ahead. I would highly recommend Club Champion and Taylor to a club fitting to get the best out of your game." — Dave W. | Charlotte, NC × × COMPLIMENTARY Get a Club Champion full bag fitting $100 off with an equipment purchase when you book and complete your fitting by 7/31/24. You must have a Club Champion fitting appointment scheduled for July 1 - 31, 2025 and you must complete the trade in process at that appointment. All trade-ins are paid via Club Champion credit; credit must be applied to Club Champion order. No cash will be given in exchange for trade ins at Club Champion; no store credit will be given for future use. A Club Champion employee will assess your clubs via Next Round's guidelines and issue both the value of the clubs and a 25% bonus on top of the value as a credit on your order. You do not need to surrender your assessed clubs until you take delivery of your new clubs from Club Champion. If the assessed clubs are not provided, the full balance of your purchase will be charged to the payment method on file. A Next Round representative will verify that the provided clubs match the quote. If there are discrepancies, the trade-in amount may be adjusted accordingly. Once clubs are provided, the transaction is finalized, and store credit is issued, items cannot be returned. Not valid in conjunction with PAR Program benefits. Club Champion reserves the right to remove or modify this promotion at any time. Appointments are limited. × × PARTNERSHIP TERMS AND CONDITIONS *All partners, regardless of past performance, start at “Partner Level” in 2023 and must qualify for higher levels. My partnership may not be renewed in 2025 if my account does not refer at least $5,000 for the full year (or a prorated amount from my 2024 signing date) but I will not be charged if I do not reach this minimum. If my account is not tagged to a client before an appointment, I may not be granted a commission. An individual sale’s commission percentage will be lowered if a junior/military/repeat discount is applied, or a non-Mill River discount is granted over 5%. The benefit package can change at any time at the discretion of Club Champion with written notice. Revenue Share: Qualifying Referrals – Referral commissions are only granted for referrals that come after partnership signing. A record of referral must exist for payment to be granted. No referral payment will be extended for an existing customer of Club Champion that predates the original partnership. Referrals can be made in three ways: • Partner sets up the appointment for the client using the portal. • Partner shares name of referred client before an appointment takes place. • Client directly references the name of the partner as the referral source when booking or at fitting. Lifetime Commissions – Commissions are paid for the lifetime of every qualifying referral for the life of partnership. Payments encompass the entirety of qualifying sales: shaft, head, grip, PUREing, customization, repairs and fitting fees. Commission percentages are based on level of partner and the amount of discount applied. All commission payments are made monthly to the partner after the purchased product is built and shipped in full. Mill River/Facility Buying Programs – Club Champion will still provide the normal commission/discounting terms for any club on a Mill River buying program in addition to a 15% client discount on club head sales UNLESS it is a stock order. If a Mill River discount is offered on a stock order, no commission will be given. Military/Junior/Repeat Discounting – Club Champion will provide a 5% commission on military/junior/repeat discounted sales of 10%. Club Champion will not provide any referral payment for any non-Mill River, military, junior, or repeat discount granted to a customer over 5%. Military: Any order with a Military discount of 5-10% results in a maximum referral payment of 5%. Over 10% results in no payment. Under 5% results in normal payment. Junior: Any order with a Junior discount of 5-10% results in a maximum referral payment of 5%. Over 10% results in no payment. Under 5% results in normal payment. Second Bag: Any order with a Second Set discount of 5-10% results in a maximum referral payment of 5%. Over 10% results in no payment. Under 5% results in normal payment. OEM Orders — Any OEM or direct from manufacturer order will result in no commission payout, however, the order will still count towards a partner's yearend referral total and partner levels. Missed-Payment Window – Partners can qualify to request commission payments if they feel a qualifying referral has been missed. All requests are subject to review and proof of referral must be given by the partner. Commission payments will not be considered without written proof of referral. Personal Benefits: Complimentary Personal Fittings – Amount of access determined by space availability, store manager discretion, and level. Benefit is only applicable for partners and select golf staff. Complimentary PUREing and VIP PUD Pricing – Amount of access determined by level. Benefit is only applicable for partners and select golf staff. Annual Master Staff Gifts – Reserved for partners that reach $50,000+ in referred sales during a calendar year. Gifts are paid out in 2023 and the Master Staff package can vary each year. In 2022, these gifts included a custom built Bettinardi Putter and Headcover created exclusively for Club Champion Master Staff Only. Business Benefits: Complimentary Use of TrackMan Bays for Personal Teaching – Access based on level. Only offered at select stores and is at the discretion of individual store managers. Inquire with a local store for full details and to book. Complimentary Client Fitting Certificates – Client fitting certificates do not accrue. Partners must use given certificates while in each level or lose them. × × Rules - This sweepstakes is hosted by Club Champion — it is not affiliated with any third party. Entries shall be made based on instructions provided; one entry per person. Any attempt to enter more than one may result in disqualification. Winners will be chosen at random and contacted via email. Any winner who does not respond within three (3) business days to accept their prize will forfeit the prize and another winner will be drawn. Prizes are subject to availability and fulfilled at Club Champion's discretion. Prizes may not be substituted, transferred, returned, or redeemed for cash. Club Champion reserves the right to remove or modify this sweepstakes at any time. × × YOU’VE BOOKED YOUR FULL BAG FITTING — NOW WHAT? Take a step-by-step look at what happens in the Club Champion fitting bay. Your fitter will get to know you and your game, along with any goals for your full bag fitting and budget considerations to keep in mind. You’ll stretch and warm up, then hit your existing clubs to set a baseline for the data we’re looking to beat. If you don’t have clubs, we can start out with a quick build from our demo matrix. For full bag fittings, we’ll work with you to pick a part of the bag — woods, irons, wedges — to start with and tackle one section at a time. Once we know what variables — ball speed, spin, launch angle, clubhead speed, distance, etc. — we want to improve, we will start with shaft options. Isolating one component at a time allows your fitter to dial in the basis of your improvement and build upon it as you go. When the best shaft profile and model is identified, your fitter will move on to clubheads and repeat the testing, using that ideal shaft for consistency. Now that you have the perfect shaft and clubhead, your fitter will finalize the details like length, lie, loft, swingweight, and grip choice before moving on to the next part of the bag and starting the process again. Once the full swing clubs are completed, you will then move to the SAM PuttLab putter studio to dial in your putter’s length, loft, toe hang, and more. There is a full bag fitting option without a putter fitting included should you want to skip the flatstick. Once everything is dialed in, you’ll be presented with a customized blueprint for lower scores — a build sheet showing you all the specs for each club, along with an itemized recommendation that lays out costs. After you place your order for a custom build by one of our Master Builders , we’ll keep you updated on your equipment’s progress via email and tell you more about our Perfect Fit Guarantee . × × Free Fitting with Custom Club Purchase Terms: Use the code provided to get a free Club Champion club fitting when you make a custom club purchase. Home - The Champions Club at Summerfield Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to footer The Champions Club at Summerfield Stuart, FL Phone: (772) 283-1500 Book Tee Times Book Member Tee Times Join E-Club Home Book Online Golf About Us Rates Scorecard & Course Layout Photo Gallery Leagues Lessons Golf Academy First Tee – Treasure Coast Events Book A Golf Event Events Calendar Past Events Bar & Grill Memberships Memberships Summer Membership Member Tee Times E-Club Text Club Send a Gift Contact Us Contact Us Career Opportunities Directions Welcome to The Champions Club at Summerfield We offer a par-72, 18-hole course designed by Tom Fazio. Also, a full driving range, putting green, and new chipping area. We are open all year to the public and our members. You will enjoy diverse Florida wildlife and nature as you drive along the beautiful Atlantic Ridge Preserve State Park that borders the course. We have a full-service restaurant offering delicious breakfast and lunch selections with the capacity for events. You can also book a lesson or get fitted for some new clubs. Champions Club Golf Leagues - The Champions Club at Summerfield Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer The Champions Club at Summerfield Stuart, FL Phone: (772) 283-1500 Book Tee Times Book Member Tee Times Join E-Club Home Book Online Golf About Us Rates Scorecard & Course Layout Photo Gallery Leagues Lessons Golf Academy First Tee – Treasure Coast Events Book A Golf Event Events Calendar Past Events Bar & Grill Memberships Memberships Summer Membership Member Tee Times E-Club Text Club Send a Gift Contact Us Contact Us Career Opportunities Directions Champions Club Golf Leagues Join One of Our Weekly Golf Leagues PQL The PQL (Points Quota League) is a local group of men that play the Champions Golf Club twice weekly – Mondays and Thursday, around 9:00am. David Ladd is the league representative and can be contacted at 561-350-6426; or by email at David@davidladd.com . This League is comprised of mostly Summerfield Residents. Join them afterwards in our Champions Grill for a cold one and some snacks or lunch. Call us at 772-283-1500 for more info. Ladies League The Ladies league is a fun event that enjoys the Champions Golf Club on Tuesday and Fridays. The process to join is to sign up to play in the Pro Shop for a Tuesday or Friday. This will be a great way to meet the ladies currently in the league and enjoy the day with a fun group! Join them afterwards in our Champions Grill for a cold one and some snacks or lunch. Call us 772-283-1500 for more info. The Nuts The NUT’s league is a fun bunch of guys that meet at the Champions Golf Club every Thursday afternoon. They have several games they include in their rounds and have a great time on the course and in the restaurant afterwards. Please contact Larry E. Doss at cell 561-373-0784 or call to learn more at 772-283-1500. Primary Sidebar Course News New driving range balls and targets! Generally, proper golf attire permits Bermuda-length shorts, khakis/slacks, and collared shirts. The policy prohibits denim, cut-offs, cargo shorts, and tee shirts.
